content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Juan. I would like to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 600 Euros per month. Can you propose a rental price for me?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This price takes into consideration the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am not sure if I can afford that price. Do you have any other options for me?

content: I apologize for the confusion earlier, Juan. Based on your budget of 600 Euros per month, I would like to propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month for the apartment. This price takes into consideration the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine
